posts.post_content:
Hey all. Been working on the T206 set since the first of the year and have some dupes available. Scans are below. Please drop me a PM or email if you see one you like. Price shown includes insured shipping to your door. All forms of payment are A-Okay. Thanks everyone, Tony
[url]andreatny@q.com[/url]

Raw VG/EX Waddell port (Piedmont) - **SOLD**
Raw VG/EX Willis portrait (Piedmont) - **SOLD**
RAW GOOD Eddie Collins (Piedmont) - **SOLD**
(Note: small tik of paper loss on the "U" in the word Quality on the reverse & faint X's written on all 4 back corners. Was a PSA 2)  
Raw VG/EX Chance yellow portrait (Piedmont) - **SOLD**
Raw VG/EX Jennings portrait (Piedmont) - **SOLD**
Raw EX Chase blue portrait (Piedmont) - **SOLD**
Raw VG/EX Keeler portrait (Piedmont) - **SOLD**
Psa-5 Mcgraw portrait no cap (Piedmont) - **SOLD**
Psa-3 Johnson portrait (Piedmont) - **SOLD**
Sgc60 M. Brown portrait (Lionel Carter card / Piedmont) - **SOLD**

Tony,
email sent on the Brown portrait.
Kris

Thanks all. I believe all pm's and emails have now been returned. One final bump for adjusted prices on the remaining cards. Please see them above.
Best,
        Tony A.
Hey Tony- PM sent on the McGraw. Thanks.
I'll take the chance portrait, also sent email about waddell
